alert.note: Alert for District of Columbia (District of Columbia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 12 at 10:05PM EST until January 13 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 4 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central and western Maryland, The District of Columbia, northern and northwest Virginia and eastern and panhandle West Virginia. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 4 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
